Package OODPg5

Class SaleRevenue

java.lang.Object
OODPg5.SaleRevenue
public class SaleRevenue
extends java.lang.Object
Represents the sales revenue of the restaurant
Author:
Group 5

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Order>> year
    Array list of orders placed in a year, consisting of array list of orders placed in each month of the year

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    SaleRevenue()
    Creates a nested array list to record sales revenue of restaurant for up to a year

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addOrder​(Order order)
    Record an order placed as part of the year's sales revenue
    void printSalesRevenueDay​(java.time.LocalDate date)
    Print all the sales revenue for the stated date
    void printSalesRevenueMonth​(int mnth)
    Print all the sales revenue for the stated month
    void printSalesRevenueYear()
    Print all the recorded sales revenue up to a year

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
